name: UNIF ROM File
summary: Learn about .UNIF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Universal NES Image Format (UNIF) is an alternative to the .NES format for storing NES and Famicom images. It was originally developed by Tennessee Carmel-Veilleux but then abandoned in 2008. Since 2011, the UNIF format has been maintained by the libunif project and.
NOTE: The UNIF file extension is not as common as the .UNF extension.

description: Game ROM used by the Nestopia emulator to play Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) video games; also used to play Famicom video games, which was the Japanese version of the NES.
